item.description:
Join SinglesCT.com for a great evening of Bowling and New Friends at a BIG Discount

UNLIMITED Galactic Bowling from 8 pm to Closing
Shoes, Soda, and Snacks are included!

Hang out with the CT Party Crew and have a great time at discount price

- $50 worth of Bowling, Shoe Rentals, Food and Soda (plus prizes) for only $15- save $5 and get your ticket in advance for only $10 – only at http://www.SinglesCT....

Watch us transform the bowling center into party central with glowing black lights, special effect lighting, and state of the art sound system. …it’s a whole new game!

at:

Spare Time Bristol
177 Farmington Ave
(Route 6) Bristol, CT 06010

84 to Route 6 West exit 38
Straight on Route 6 for 8.3 miles
Spare Time is on your Right

FOR DIRECTIONS VISIT: http://maps.google.co...

Advance Tickets are only $10
Tickets at the event are $15

Check out our ad in the Hartford Courant

Visit http://www.SinglesCT.... or http://www.Meetup.com...
or call (860) 236-3343 for more info

SEE YOU AT THE PARTY!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Central CT Singles Party Tonight signs

group.name: CTMatch Singles Events Music Dance Speed Dating Golf Comedy

item.name: Join SinglesCT.com for a FUN Nite of Bowling and New Friends at a BIG Discount!
